AttackerCapabilities: Ability to access and navigate web applications

SecurityMeasures: Access control to limit who can access challenges
Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption for secure communication

Steps.Description: Access the web application and navigate to the challenge page

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to access the challenge page to find the flag.
StepDetails.Action: Open a web browser and enter the URL of the web application. Navigate to the challenge page.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully accesses the challenge page.

Steps.Description: Observe the challenge page and search for the flag

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the flag is hidden somewhere on the challenge page.
StepDetails.Action: Scan the challenge page for any hidden text, images, or clues that may indicate the presence of the flag.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the flag displayed on the challenge page.
